title: Productivity Tuesday Ep#3 -- Evernote for Beginners
description: Try Evernote premium for FREE --    Welcome to the third episode of productivity Tuesday. Today, we are going to take a look at Evernote -- the popular note taking application.   This is the beginners tutorial for Evernote.   [Video content]  #1 What exactly is Evernote #2 Practical use case of Evernote #3 Free and premium plan #4 Understand the basic structure #5 6 Ways to add content to Evernote #6 How to organize effectively  [Other Videos in productivity Tuesday Series]       I use Audio from YouTube audio library.
